content: Similarly, the setData and addData family of functions supported by GeomVertexWriter accept a value in the indicated format, and convert it to whatever format is required by the column. So if you call setData3(), and the column has three components, you will set all three components with the x, y, z parameters of setData3(); but if the column has only two components, only the x, y parameters will be used to set those two components, and the third parameter will be ignored.
